Producer: Arnold Rifkin, Bruce Willis, Arnon Milchan
Screenwriter: I. Marlene King, Amy B. Harris
Synopsis: As the luckiest woman in the world, Ashley (Lindsay Lohan) has a wonderful life, which all changes after she kisses a stranger (Chris Pine) at a costume party. She sees everything turn into a living hell, as she realizes that she has unwittingly exchanged her good fortune for the stranger's bad luck.
Title: Just My Luck
